title: Crime Alert 09.25.19
itunes:title: Crime Alert 09.25.19
description:
Baby dies after mom uses heroin on her gums. Woman steals $6,000 in quarters. Woman charged after home catches fire when she burns love letters on the carpet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
